sentences: Dragomir Herendić, known by his stage name Dragianni, is a Croatian guitarist, sound engineer, and record producer.
In 1999, Herendić joined the Bosnian garage rock band Zabranjeno Pušenje.
He performed, recorded and produced their seventh studio albums Bog vozi Mercedes (2001), as well as on a live album; Live in St. Louis (2004).
